attributes.name: Locations Around the Seat of Mavros
Wave by Wave in the Mountain Pass

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUH7j27UxsINuAsEDLS_description
attribs.current: When the dust goblin attacks a creature from hiding, its target must make a successful DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUH7mHm1LcFEn3kTu-K_description
attribs.current: The dog makes two bite attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUH7mHm1LcFEn3kTu-L_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5, 1d10, on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUH7mHnt8DF76Vb8cM2_description
attribs.current: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQaERELkfhcGcZQb_description
attribs.current: Dogmole juggernauts cannot burrow into solid rock, but they can move through softer material like soil or loose rubble, leaving a usable tunnel 10 ft. in diameter.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQaERELkfhcGcZQc_description
attribs.current: When the dogmole juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQaFnmzqi8vBNYRm_description
attribs.current: A dogmole juggernaut is treated as one size larger if doing so is advantageous to it (such as during grapple checks, pushing attempts, and tripping attempts, but not for the purposes of squeezing or AC). It gains advantage against magical pushing attempts such as gust of wind or Repelling Blast.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQaFnmzqi8vBNYRn_description
attribs.current: Wild dogmole juggernaut packs are famed for their battles against the monsters of the dark caverns of the world. If a dogmole juggernaut draws blood against vermin, purple worms, or other underground invertebrates, it gains a + 4 bonus to Strength and Constitution but suffers a −2 penalty to AC. The wormkiller rage lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1 + its Constitution modifier (minimum 1 round). It cannot end the rage voluntarily while the creatures that sent it into a rage still live.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQaFnmzqi8vBNYRo_description
attribs.current: The dogmole juggernaut makes one claw attack and one bite attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQcFTW4KErDHBKqj_description
attribs.current: When the goblin attacks a creature from hiding, its target must make a successful DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQcG1sxmMo0918yK_description
attribs.current: The dust goblin machinist does not need to sleep but must spend four hours every day maintaining its clockwork enhancements.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQdmJr47cI5fP5Zb_description
attribs.current: When the dust goblin void caller attacks a creature from hiding, the target must make a successful DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQdmJr47cI5fP5Zc_description
attribs.current: When the void caller casts a spell, as a bonus action it can utter a few words of void speech and weave dark magic into the spell. The target of such a tainted spell has disadvantage on the next attack roll or ability check it makes until the start of the void caller's next turn. The void caller can't use this ability while unable to speak.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQdmJr47cI5fP5Zd_description
attribs.current:
The dust goblin void caller is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The void caller has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): crushing curse*, poison spray, word of misfortune*
1st level (4 slots): entangle, fairie fire, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, destructive resonance*, spike growth
3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, void strike*, wind wall
4th level (1 slot): blight

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-MUPTQdn53MxTdglHXBx_description
attribs.current: When the void caller is damaged by a creature within 60 feet, it can use its reaction to bark a destructive word of void speech. If the creature can hear the void caller, it takes 6 necrotic damage. A void caller can't use this ability if it is unable to speak.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUf8kpR6roUurnQJv4D_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You speak a word of Void Speech. Choose a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d6 psychic damage and be deafened for 1 minute, except that it can still hear Void Speech. A creature deafened in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
This spell’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUf8kpR6roUurnQJv4D_spelltarget
attribs.current: a creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUf8mQ0PsDmmPyQRycH_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

​⁠This spell’s damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level (2d12), 11th level (3d12), and 17th level (4d12).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUf8mQ0PsDmmPyQRycH_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUf8pRe-Y0CKoaFUMwH_spelldescription
attribs.current: You hiss a word of Void Speech. Choose one creature you can see within range. The next time the target makes a saving throw during the spell’s duration, it must roll a d4 and subtract the result from the total of the saving throw. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MUf8pRe-Y0CKoaFUMwH_spelltarget
attribs.current: one creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUf8tgxS90L095ZEeG5_spelldescription
attribs.current: Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain. A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself. When the spell ends, the conjured plants wilt away.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUf8z6aQEpL0hQ5nLuo_spelldescription
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can’t benefit from being invisible.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUf8z6aQEpL0hQ5nLuo_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUf90qVw4KW8zRxSN3R_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MUf90qVw4KW8zRxSN3R_spelldescription
attribs.current: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn’t pushed. In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell’s effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf93KW5IjAicZtXxjv_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target’s skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target’s AC can’t be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf95426r1cJIHB5At-_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf95426r1cJIHB5At-_spelldescription
attribs.current: You shout a scathing string of Void Speech that assaults the minds of those before you. Each creature in a 15-foot cone that can hear you takes 4d6 psychic damage, or half that damage with a successful Wisdom saving throw. A creature damaged by this spell can’t take reactions until the start of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf95426r1cJIHB5At-_spelltarget
attribs.current: each creature within a 15-foot cone of the caster

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf96qLbQeoLIMHJdGB_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened to a point

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf96qLbQeoLIMHJdGB_spelldescription
attribs.current: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels. The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can’t see the area at the time the spell is cast must make a Wisdom (Perception) check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-MUf96qLbQeoLIMHJdGB_spelltarget
attribs.current: A 20-foot radius centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9CR9WH2cug2xEvfZ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you automatically end the effects of a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you used.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9CR9WH2cug2xEvfZ_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell’s level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9CR9WH2cug2xEvfZ_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature, object, or magical effect within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9E8ZLtGbUJWhReO7_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast the spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9E8ZLtGbUJWhReO7_spelldescription
attribs.current: With a short phrase of Void Speech, you gather writhing darkness around your hand. When you cast the spell, and as an action on subsequent turns while you maintain concentration, you can unleash a bolt of darkness at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. If the target is in dim light or darkness, you have advantage on the roll. On a hit, the target takes 5d8 necrotic damage and is frightened of you until the start of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9FgcyRluJliCGcvp_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny fan and a feather of exotic origin

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9FgcyRluJliCGcvp_spelldescription
attribs.current: A wall of strong wind rises from the ground at a point you choose within range. You can make the wall up to 50 feet long, 15 feet high, and 1 foot thick. You can shape the wall in any way you choose so long as it makes one continuous path along the ground. The wall lasts for the duration. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Strength saving throw. A creature takes 3d8 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The strong wind keeps fog, smoke, and other gases at bay. Small or smaller flying creatures or objects can’t pass through the wall. Loose, lightweight materials brought into the wall fly upward. Arrows, bolts, and other ordinary projectiles launched at targets behind the wall are deflected upward and automatically miss. (Boulders hurled by giants or siege engines, and similar projectiles, are unaffected.) Creatures in gaseous form can’t pass through it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-MUf9FgcyRluJliCGcvp_spelltarget
attribs.current: The ground at a point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUf9HCDxks61tG99PEC_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUf9HCDxks61tG99PEC_spelldescription
attribs.current: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 8d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs. If you target a plant creature or a magical plant, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it. If you target a nonmagical plant that isn’t a creature, such as a tree or shrub, it doesn’t make a saving throw; it simply withers and dies.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-MUf9HCDxks61tG99PEC_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQfKtqLnFLvTR4yJ_description
attribs.current: When the dust goblin warrior attacks a creature from hiding, the target must make a successful DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQfKtqLnFLvTR4yK_description
attribs.current: Once per turn, the dust goblin warrior can deal an extra 3 (1d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the dust goblin warrior that isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQfKtqLnFLvTR4yL_description
attribs.current: The dust goblin warrior makes two melee attacks with its handaxe.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQfLCUc4h2qZOzao_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +0, Range reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQikrXe0gXWWfH25_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQn6bT9Q4LiMsnM5_description
attribs.current: If the gnoll attacks two creatures in the same turn, the first target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQn6bT9Q4LiMsnM6_description
attribs.current: The gnoll can Dash or Disengage as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQn7t0W26y9JxDfQ_description
attribs.current: The gnoll has advantage on its attack rolls against a target if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQn7t0W26y9JxDfR_description
attribs.current: The gnoll makes one bite attack and two battleaxe attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQouiIvydbi04iy2_description
attribs.current: Dust goblins within 100 feet of Karbekul will not retreat from combat and are immune to being frightened. This feature does not work when Karbekul is unconscious or dead.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQouiIvydbi04iy3_description
attribs.current: As a bonus action, Karbekul can cause a creature he has hit with an unarmed strike to either fall prone or be shoved 10 feet away from him unless the affected creature makes a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQouiIvydbi04iy4_description
attribs.current: When Karbekul attacks a creature from hiding, the target must make a successful DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQovZefyNrSs1z7U_description
attribs.current: Karbekul makes three attacks, in any combination of melee or ranged.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-MUPTQovZefyNrSs1z7X_description
attribs.current: Karbekul can deflect a missile when he is targeted with a ranged weapon attack, reducing damage to himself by 19 (1d10 + 14) points.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQr8bowdRNl3HARH_description
attribs.current: When the dust goblin attacks a creature from hiding, the target must make a successful DC 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQr8bowdRNl3HARI_description
attribs.current: Marlik the Fearless deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage when he hits with a weapon attack (included in the attack).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQr90hupVINIRmih_description
attribs.current: Marlik can use a bonus action to regain 17 (1d10 + 12) hit points. After using this feature, Marlik must finish a short or long rest before using it again.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQr90hupVINIRmii_description
attribs.current: Marlik the Fearless makes two attacks with his shortsword and one with his dagger.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQrAX2o6lENMOars_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +0, Reach reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft., one creature

attribs.name: npc_condition_immunities
attribs.current: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQyFvVDBbzIf3IgG_description
attribs.current: The rotting wind can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQyFvVDBbzIf3IgH_description
attribs.current: Damage from the rotting wind's Wind of Decay is doubled against plant creatures.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTQyFvVDBbzIf3IgI_description
attribs.current: The rotting wind is always invisible.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTQyGUoWTSUx2FAZ2_description
attribs.current: plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with tomb rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by remove curse or comparable magic.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: Dwarvish, Giant, Trade Tongue; see Gift of Tongues

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTR6ZfkZeTJ2YXj-g_description
attribs.current: The angel of war's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, it does an extra 18 (4d8) radiant damage (included in attacks).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTR6ZfkZeTJ2YXj-h_description
attribs.current: The angel of war can instantly discern which side of a conflict all participants belong to.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTR6ZfkZeTJ2YXj-i_description
attribs.current: The angel of war automatically succeeds on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTR6ZfkZeTJ2YXj-j_description
attribs.current: The angel of war becomes fluent in any language she hears spoken for at least 1 minute and she retains this knowledge forever.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTR6ZfkZeTJ2YXj-k_description
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the angel of war can sing a song of martial glory in her clarion voice. All creatures within 100 feet of her take 16 (3d10) thunder damage. A creature doesn't need to hear the song to be affected (deafened creatures are affected), but the song must be able to reach the creature (a creature is immune while inside the area affected by a silence spell, for example).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUPTR6ZMSQdYfv4ZpR-_description
attribs.current:
The angel of war's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.
At will: bane, bless, invisibility, sacred flame, spare the dying, speak with animals, thaumaturgy
5/day each: gentle repose, healing word, warding bond
3/day each: flame strike, mass healing word, revivify
1/day each: commune, death ward, freedom of movement, geas

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTR6bDZK9ERyUJK3v_description
attribs.current: The angel of war makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MUPTR6bDZK9ERyUJK3w_description
attribs.current: if wielded with two hands, plus 18 (4d8

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-MUPTR6cc3u4CQqfLQL9_description
attribs.current: The angel of war casts one spell from her at-will list.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-MUPTR6cc3u4CQqfLQLA_description
attribs.current: The angel makes one longsword or longbow attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-MUPTR6cc3u4CQqfLQLB_description
attribs.current: The angel of war casts healing word, mass healing word, or revivify.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUVC2rmdYZEFuYJ6gWp_description
attribs.current: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MUVGiVF0nRop1kKV68w_description
attribs.current: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

attribs.name: npc_languages
attribs.current: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak
